description:
A nested model to contain the specific chemical analysis results of a soil sample.
Units are generally in parts per million (ppm) unless otherwise specified.

organicMatterPercent.description: Percentage of organic matter in the soil.
organicMatterPercent.title: Organicmatterpercent

nitrogenPpm.description: Nitrogen (N) concentration in parts per million.
nitrogenPpm.title: Nitrogenppm

phosphorusPpm.description: Phosphorus (P) concentration in parts per million.
phosphorusPpm.title: Phosphorusppm

potassiumPpm.description: Potassium (K) concentration in parts per million.
potassiumPpm.title: Potassiumppm

calciumPpm.description: Calcium (Ca) concentration in parts per million.
calciumPpm.title: Calciumppm

magnesiumPct.description: Magnesium (Mg) concentration in parts per million.
magnesiumPct.title: Magnesiumpct

zincPpm.description: Zinc (Zn) concentration in parts per million.
zincPpm.title: Zincppm

ironPpm.description: Iron (Fe) concentration in parts per million.
ironPpm.title: Ironppm

manganesePpm.description: Manganese (Mn) concentration in parts per million.
manganesePpm.title: Manganeseppm

copperPpm.description: Copper (Cu) concentration in parts per million.
copperPpm.title: Copperppm

boronPpm.description: Boron (B) concentration in parts per million.
boronPpm.title: Boronppm

molybdenumPpm.description: Molybdenum (Mo) concentration in parts per million.
molybdenumPpm.title: Molybdenumppm

title: SoilAnalysis
